body.p: An XML Schema describes the structure of an XML document and is used to validate XML document instances against it, to check that the XML instances conform to the specified requirements. If an XML instance conforms to the schema then it is said to be valid, otherwise it is invalid.

Two editing modes are provided for working with XML Schema:
The Text editing mode.
The visual Design editing mode. offers support for both XML schema 1.0 and 1.1.
